scraped_pages.title: How to make subscription payment - Rwanda | Biashara Plus
headings: How to make subscription payment - Rwanda
paragraphs: English (US)
Click on the "Profile" button located at the bottom of your home page.
Scroll down and press on "Make Payment." You will be taken directly to the payment packages.

Choose your payment plan on the payment packages page: Super Eagle (for all countries) or Eagle (for one country).Note:The payment plan will direct you to your payment duration; thats either a six-month duration or a twelve-month duration.

4. After you choose your payment method by clicking Proceed with DirectPay 5. Finally you complete your payment either by filling in your card or mobile money details. Card PaymentMobile money Payment
Note: Input your phone number. Make sure you have access to or can reach a phone with this number to verify your payment.
Powered by Froala Editor
Was this article helpful?

scraped_pages.title: Introduction to Biashara Plus | Biashara Plus
paragraphs: English (US)
Biashara Plus is a digital price list that allows Forever Business Owners to receive instant price updates and make orders.
Biashara is a Swahili word meaning "business."
Biashara Plus is a well-designed and user-friendly app that aims to help Forever Business Owners access product price lists and use extra time for biashara.

Over 10,000 Forever Living Business Owners in Africa have selected Biashara Plus as their business-simplifying tool. It is currently accessible in nine (9) nations: Tanzania, Kenya, Uganda, Rwanda, Burundi, Zambia, South Africa, Botswana, and Namibia. (We are growing continuously.)
Benefits of Biashara Plus
Set goals and achieve them. With a history of your sales and purchases, you can easily track your progress.
Save time and order faster. You just pick up the products, and the calculations will be done for you.
Stay up-to-date. You will be the first to get new price lists as soon as they come in, wherever you are.
Our pricing

Biashara Plus subscriptions start at six months. With Eagle packages, you will have access to the prices of your operating country; with Super Eagle, you will be able to access the price list for all listed Forever Living Products countries.
Subscription payments
Note: We offer one free month for trial users.
Eagle Package
Super Eagle Package
12 - Months
12 - Months
South Africa
Powered by Froala Editor
Was this article helpful?

You just pick up the products, and the calculations will be done for you. Stay up-to-date. You will be the first to get new price lists as soon as they come in, wherever you are. Our pricing Biashara Plus subscriptions start at six months. With Eagle packages, you will have access to the prices of your operating country; with Super Eagle, you will be able to access the price list for all listed Forever Living Products countries. scraped_pages.title: How To Make Order Payment - Rwanda | Biashara Plus
headings: How To Make Order Payment - Rwanda
paragraphs: English (US)
NOTE: Sending orders is not available at the retail level.
In order to change levels, press the level button at the top left corner of the screen and select a level different from Retail.
Select the list of products for the order by selecting their quantity. At the bottom, a row will appear showing the total price and the Case Credit (CC) for the selected prices.
After selecting the products, press the "My Cart" button at the bottom right corner of the page. There you will be able to change the quantity.
Once its verified, click on "Checkout."
Checkout will directly take you to FBO Details
FLP Center Details. You select the HQ for sending the order
Self pick up
Payment DetailsAttach a proof of payment for the order then click on the Continue To Send Order
Once the payment is successful, you will be taken back to the home page.
Powered by Froala Editor
Was this article helpful?

scraped_pages.title: How to register for Biashara Plus | Biashara Plus
headings: How to register for Biashara Plus
paragraphs: English (US)
Click on the Biashara Plus app. A list of languages will appear. Choose your preferred language to use.
Tap "Sign in with Google" or "Sign in with Apple" to go directly to where you can enter your email address.
Add the email address you want to use to sign up for Biashara Plus.
Click "Yes" to start registering yourself
Enter the Forever Business Owner ID (FBO ID) that you will be using then click on Save. It must have eight digits.
Enter the country you are in. Additionally, there are five levels: Preferred Customer  Assistant Supervisor  Supervisor  Assistant Manager  Manager. Tap your level.
Note: The retail level provides you with a selling price.
Add the phone number that you will be using in Biashara Plus.
Click on "Let's Get Started" once you are done filling out all the registration information. You will be taken straight to the home page.
Click on "retail" in the upper left corner of the page. A list of levels will appear on the lower part of your page. This will help you choose your level.
If you need any help regarding the app, click on the question mark in the upper right corner of the page. This will directly take you to the help page.

For more assistance, click "Chat with Center" or visit one of our social media pages (Facebook, Instagram, or WhatsApp). You can click "Send Us Feedback" to provide feedback. Click "Frequently Asked Questions" (FAQs) in the lower section of the page for additional instructions.
To switch countries, click on the flag in the top-right corner of your page.
"Profile" provides personal information such as your mobile number, FBO ID, default country, total CC, current level, subscription package, and time remaining for your package to end..
To log out or make a subscription payment, click on your Biashara Plus profile.
To change your username, go to your profile, click on your name, and then enter the new one.
Click on My order to see saved or completed orders
To change country or change language, see data backup, or see version control, click on "setting."
Powered by Froala Editor
Was this article helpful?

Click on "retail" in the upper left corner of the page. A list of levels will appear on the lower part of your page. This will help you choose your level. If you need any help regarding the app, click on the  question mark  in the upper right corner of the page. This will directly take you to the help page. For more assistance, click " Chat with Center " or visit one of our social media pages ( Facebook, Instagram, or WhatsApp ). You can click " Send Us Feedback " to provide feedback. Click "Frequently Asked Questions" ( FAQs ) in the lower section of the page for additional instructions. To switch countries, click on the  flag in the top-right corner of your page. "Profile" provides personal information such as your mobile number, FBO ID, default country, total CC, current level, subscription package, and time remaining for your package to end. . To log out or make a subscription payment, click on your Biashara Plus profile. To change your username, go to your profile , click on your name, and then enter the new one. scraped_pages.title: Mobile money subscription payment | Biashara Plus
paragraphs: English (US)
To pay for subscriptions using mobile money, follow the instructions below
At the bottom of your home page, click the "Profile" button.
Scroll down and press "Make Payment." You will directly be taken to the payment packages.
Choose your payment plan on the payment packages page: Super Eagle (for all countries) or Eagle (for one country).
Note:The payment plan will direct you to your payment duration; thats either a six-month duration or a twelve-month duration.
After you choose your payment method by clicking Proceed with DirectPay.
Click on the "MOBILE MONEY" button located on the right side of your page. Then click on "Select your mobile country" to see available countries.
Select the country you are in, and this will directly show you the available mobile money options in your country that are accepted to pay for Biashara Plus.
Click on the mobile money button for instant MTN for Zambia. You will directly see where to add your phone number details.
Insert your phone number, then press the "Continue to Pay" button.
Finally, you will receive a prompt to enter your mobile money pin to approve the amount to be deducted. You will receive an SMS confirmation of your transaction.
Powered by Froala Editor
Was this article helpful?

Click on the mobile money button for instant MTN for Zambia . You will directly see where to add your phone number details. Insert your phone number, then press the "Continue to Pay" button. scraped_pages.title: How to install Biashara Plus app | Biashara Plus
headings: How to install Biashara Plus app
paragraphs: English (US)
Note: Currently, Biashara Plus is found in play store and App store [Android, iPhone]
Link: https://linktr.ee/biasharaplus

Open the Play Store app for Android or the App Store for iPhone, located in the list of icons on your phone. It will show you a list of topics like games, apps, movies, TV shows, and books. You chose apps.
Search for the Biashara Plus app in the app section.
Tap the screen to select the Biashara Plus app. Once you view it, select "Install." If it requests your permission to proceed, press Accept.
Once you're done with installation, tap on open to start using the app.
Powered by Froala Editor
Was this article helpful?

scraped_pages.text_content: How to install Biashara Plus app | Biashara Plus Biashara Plus > How to install Biashara Plus app Guides in this category How to install Biashara Plus app How to register for Biashara Plus Introduction to Biashara Plus How to install Biashara Plus app Note: Currently, Biashara Plus is found in play store and App store [Android, iPhone] Link: https://linktr.ee/biasharaplus Open the Play Store app for Android or the App Store for iPhone, located in the list of icons on your phone. It will show you a list of topics like games, apps, movies, TV shows, and books. You chose apps . Search for the Biashara Plus app in the app section. Tap the screen to select the Biashara Plus app . Once you view it, select "Install. " If it requests your permission to proceed, press Accept . Once you're done with installation, tap on open to start using the app. Powered by Froala Editor Was this article helpful? Didn't find the answer? Contact us

scraped_pages.title: App not available issue | Biashara Plus
paragraphs: English (US)
Some FBOs face difficulty finding the Biashara Plus App on the App Store. They come across the "App not available" message. This problem hinders them from downloading and installing the app.
Causes of the Issue:
This problem arises in two cases:
If you're not in a country with Biashara Plus access
The service is presently accessible only in these countries:
South Africa
If your App Store is registered in countries without Bishara Plus access,
How to Change Country in the App Store
Navigate to Settings and Select Media &Purchases.
By clicking on Media & Purchases, you will be taken directly to View Account.
On the account page, locate and select "Country/Region."
Country/Region will directly take you to Change Country or Region
Select your country under "Change Country or Region," then tap "Done" to save your selection.
For further support, contact our customer support team at +255679516178
Powered by Froala Editor
Was this article helpful?

NOTE: Sending orders is not available at the retail level.
In order to change levels, press the level button at the top left corner of the screen and select a level different from Retail.
Select the list of products for the order by selecting their quantity. At the bottom, a row will appear showing the total price and the Case Credit (CC) for the selected prices.
After selecting the products, press the "My Cart" button at the bottom right corner of the page. There you will be able to change the quantity.
Once its verified, click on "Checkout."
Checkout will directly take you to FBO Details

scraped_pages.title: Resolving the "Business ID has already been taken" Issue | Biashara Plus
headings: Resolving the "Business ID has already been taken" Issue
paragraphs: English (US)

Some FBOs, when attempting to log in to their accounts, may encounter an error message stating, "The Business ID has already been taken." This issue prevents FBOs from accessing their accounts and conducting their business operations smoothly.
Causes of the Issue:
The issue arises when there is a change in your email. It commonly occurs in two scenarios:
Forgetting the password: Some FBOs change their emails after forgetting their passwords.
Mistaken email change: Others mistakenly change their email after switching their phones.
To resolve the issue,
Double-check the email. Make sure you enter the same email you used during the registration process.
Verify accuracy: Ensure that there are no spelling errors or typos in the email address you input.
Contact Customer Support
If the issue persists, reach out to our customer support team for further assistance.
Contact information for customer support: +255679516178
Provide them with your Business ID and a detailed description of the issue you are facing.
Our support team will investigate the problem and guide you through the resolution process.

By following the steps outlined above and reaching out to our customer support team, you can resolve this issue and regain access to your account. We are committed to providing prompt assistance and ensuring a smooth experience for all our valued customers.
Powered by Froala Editor
Was this article helpful?

scraped_pages.title: How to make subscription payment - South Africa | Biashara Plus
headings: How to make subscription payment - South Africa
paragraphs: English (US)
Click on the "Profile" button located at the bottom of your home page.
Scroll down and press "Make Payment." You will be taken directly to the payment packages.

Choose your payment plan on the payment packages page: Super Eagle (for all countries) or Eagle (for one country).Note:The payment plan will direct you to your payment duration; thats either a six-month duration or a twelve-month duration.
4. After you choose your payment method by clicking Proceed with DirectPay.
5. Finally you complete your payment by filling in your card details.
Powered by Froala Editor
